items.sentence: Tom wondered if Mary loved him as much as he loved her.
Tom wrote a short story about a young girl and her dog.
Tom says he needs to ask Mary where she put his camera.
Was the book that you were reading yesterday in French?
Tom was immediately taken into custody for questioning.
Tom was in jail that night so he has the perfect alibi.
Tom was kept in the hospital overnight for observation.
Tom was late for the meeting because he ran out of gas.
Tom was living in Boston when his parents got divorced.
Tom is the only one here who has never lived in Boston.
Tom is the only one here who knows how to speak French.
Tom is the only one in our family who can speak French.
Tom is the only one who knows when we need to be there.
Tom is the only one who seems to know where Mary lives.
Tom says he doesn\'t remember seeing Mary at the party.
Tell us what you want and we\'ll try to get it for you.
That doesn\'t seem like the kind of thing Tom would do.
Was I supposed to buy something for you on my way home?
Tom boiled the well water so it would be safe to drink.
Tom came downstairs, so we stopped kissing immediately.
